mapper.select: SELECT blockCount, currentPage/blockCount currentBlock, floor(currentPage/5)*blockCount+1 startPageNum, floor(currentPage/5)*blockCount+5 lastPageNum, totalCount, totalPage, currentPage, decode (currentPage, ceil(totalCount/3)-1, 1, 0) last, decode (currentPage, 0, 1, 0) first from ( select 5 blockCount, #{currentBlock} currentBlock, #{startPageNum} startPageNum, #{lastPageNum} lastPageNum, count(*) totalCount, ceil(Count(*)/3) totalPage, #{page} currentPage, 0 last, 0 first from boards )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (id, title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(boards_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, u.username FROM boards b INNER JOIN users u ON b.usersId = u.id ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 3 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
